name: Hang The Gods - Prototype (v0.0.1]
description:
This is a Prototype for the character movement, this is a very early prototype so there will be a few bugs.

Hang The Gods is a metroidvania set in ancient Japan where the Gods grew jealous of what man has created, so they decided to attack.

A hundred years have passed and corruption has consumed the lands...

Who will restore the balance?

Please give me any feedback that you might have, it will be greatly appreciated!

Discord: https://discord.gg/Pr5ZJcT
